name: bobsleigh

[ C ] (US bobsled) a small vehicle with long metal blades under it, built for racing down tracks covered with ice: We watched athletes careering down an icy track on bobsleighs. Synonym
bob
Dmytro Aksonov/E+/GettyImages
[ U ] (US bobsledding, bobsled) a sport in which you race down a track covered in ice in a small vehicle with long metal blades under it: The team won gold in the bobsleigh in the winter Olympics. It was the first female bobsleigh team.
More examplesFewer examplesSkiing and snowboarding lessons are offered and bobsleighs can be hired.The road became a bit like a bobsleigh track.In a bobsleigh team, whether you are a braker or a driver you need ability and bulk.
